about_the_game:
This collection of eerie ambient beats, handcrafted into mp3s by a 900 kg psionic sewer monster named Grankle between her larval states, is perfect for getting to know that special spirit or spirits in your life.

Except the last two tracks (Dead in the Water and RIP Tide) which were written and recorded by a guy named Doug Hoyer who is just really good at music.
